data.text: Ever thought that going upwind might sometimes be the easiest solution? Take a look at what our pilots have to say about #landing on the #AirDolomitiBlog ✈️ https://t.co/R8quJHYBjP https://t.co/pWwKnhNeMn

With a pilot's licence and an apprenticeship as a nurse, #EllenChurch opened up to women the doors of a profession that until 1930 was reserved for men: being a #flightattendant! Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/oJwqImdhF2 https://t.co/fsRS42oVvK

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On December 25th and 26th our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed.We will be at your complete disposal from 27 to Dec 31st and from the 2nd to the 5th Jan.
 We wish you a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!

data.text:
Passion and dedication have always set #AirDolomiti and @MrAmaroneMasi apart.
The two companies from Veneto,who have partnered together for the "Winery of the Year" project,have both been supporting our country's talent for many years now.
Because all our dreams can come true. https://t.co/8T6HedSRTK

Sit back and relax, the chef is here!👨‍🍳

At Air Dolomiti we believe that the magic and the taste of #Christmas are always unique. 🥂🎄
You will find on board from Dec 20th til Jan 6th a special menu created by
@MrAmaroneMasi .All topped with Corrado Benedetti and Infermentum 😋 https://t.co/kJbMs5iTkv

data.text: Travel back in time thanks to the Lenbachhaus museum. The #Intellectual invites you to discover the works of the artists who spent time in #Munich at the beginning of the 20th century and started the Blaue Reiter movement. #AlternativeGuide https://t.co/KGeyqfkEnS

🎄It's almost time to fly and see you family for Christmas, but how do you avoid taking a load of presents with you? With a little bit of cunning and the tips on the #AirDolomitiBlog.  
https://t.co/NRnaQ3xHDC https://t.co/aXNYtO1vZj

data.text:
At Barberhouse, beards and moustaches reign supreme, but you'll also spy #Munich locals finding inspiration in select magazines and relaxing as they sip aperitifs in the lounge. https://t.co/09BYY1LqZz 
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/Rt7f8Wv5Dw

Do you need a break for yourself and some fun for the little ones? In Poing wildlife park you'll find plenty to do and lots of new four-legged friends to meet and feed. Ask how at the entrance ;) https://t.co/a2fSLIEfI9 
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/574QnpDIL2

From Dior to Emilio Pucci, through Balenciaga, many designers have created flight attendant uniforms in line with the latest fashion trends and in-flight needs. If you had to choose one to wear for a day, which would you choose? 
👉 https://t.co/On4AoFSqlN 👈
#AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/P74GxCU4AG

data.text:
Experience your own #AlternativeGuide in real life and explore #Munich from a fresh perspective. Meet the locals and discover the places to be and the secrets of its historic quarters.

Enjoy the full version of the video under https://t.co/mJldMOSG8j

What if an engine cuts out? What if radio frequency is interrupted? Some of the typical concerns of people with a fear of flying, but here's a word to help you travel carefree: #redundancy. Find more on our #AirDolomitiBlog! #avgeek https://t.co/XVaah8FOIq https://t.co/e5cyu5i8CE

Should I take my surfboard to #Munich? Definitely! It might come in handy if, like the American marines, many years ago, you too are worried you'll miss surfing. More on https://t.co/KVleh3Y5vK 
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/3XQhbdZYE7

data.text: When you're organising your next trip, what could be better than getting advice from a friend who knows you so well that they can give you all the best tips? #AlternativeGuide gives you just that, only with five friends instead of one. ;) https://t.co/q6WVvR6WrT https://t.co/PvogkD9rPM

In June and July over a thousand roses flower in #Munich, enveloping Kolumbusplatz in colours and aromas. This is Rosengarten... some locals don't even know about this special place. Discover more https://t.co/xjlXejqRYn
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/xAywpaIpLh
RT @7SpottingMUC: Air Dolomiti Embraer ERJ-195LR @Air_Dolomiti https://t.co/1NBFacNMVU

***UPDATE***
Tomorrow November 1st our Call Center will be closed. 
We will be back on November 2nd from 8.30 am to 8.00 pm.

*** Information on announced strike action ***
In the expectation of national #strike in Italy announced for tomorrow, October 25th, 2018: may we invite you to verify the availability of your flight at our Sales Centre(+39 045 288 6140) or Lufthansa Customer Service (899 198 000)

data.text: A partire dal 2019 sarà attiva l'#AccademiadiVolo firmata #AirDolomiti grazie alla quale nasceranno nuovi piloti. La compagnia sta investendo per ricercare ragazzi che desiderano intraprendere la carriera da #FirstOfficer. Qui tutti i dettagli: https://t.co/TdhkhS4E47 https://t.co/gZYCSrY80M

Traditional or street food, raw or cooked, wood-fired or smoked: at the Fishing Lab Alle Murate restaurant, fish is taken seriously. And when it comes to quality and hospitality our #Miss doesn’t mess around! https://t.co/fNI1fOnxyw #AlternativeGuide #Florence https://t.co/IAUjE3uWib

data.text: It's thanks to an ivory letter opener with a mysterious engraving that we can now learn and fantasise about the life of the first #flightattendant in history. #AirDolomitiBlog brings you the life of #HeinrichKubis! ✈️#aviation https://t.co/VP54UlgRzi

Two arts and two cultures coexist in the atelier of Lapo and Michiko:he is a sixth-generation Florentine bookbinder,she is Japanese and has been a paper restorer for fifteen years.Together they make up one of Florence's top craft centres https://t.co/ipRNYmzwUe

data.text:
A slice of Italian cultural history is found in Caffè Marinetti, where the Italian Futurist movement was born. An unmissable stop-off for our #Intellectual and for those who love art, history and literature: https://t.co/61BPcq6odY
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/mv2kq9qpdU

You land and find out that they’ve lost your luggage - don’t panic! Breathe, count to 10 and (re)read our advice on what to do in this situation. #AirDolomitiBlog #lostluggage #lostandfound https://t.co/Fz0WxpxAmx https://t.co/vButLdj8oV

Rising up above the medieval villages of the Apennine Mountains sits a Moorish castle with a curious mix of styles: #RocchettaMattei. Have you ever heard of the eccentric Count Mattei and his medical therapy called electromyopathy? https://t.co/sX9AZhJ8kl #AlternativeGuide #BLQ https://t.co/wMVlyIHp31

Hai sempre sognato di volare? ✈️
Se hai tra i 21 e i 45 anni e hai conseguito la licenza di pilota di linea, mandaci la tua candidatura e partecipa alle selezioni per entrare a far parte del nostro team! https://t.co/JG8D6LPZEN #AirDolomiti #DirectEntry #FirstOfficer #e195 https://t.co/M5WOdnD1QM

data.text: Se il tuo sogno nel cassetto è diventare #AssistenteDiVolo, non perdere l'occasione di iscriverti ai nostri Recruiting Days che si terranno a #Verona, #Milano, #Merano e #Bressanone a settembre! ✈️Ti aspetiamo! https://t.co/Ey2lBYVSC4 #cabincrew #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/iigjIk6OxG

data.text:
#Verona is the ideal place for #sportslovers! Via Torricelle, as well as being one of the most famous panoramic streets in the city, offers the perfect #running and #cycling route! ‍🏃‍♂️🚴‍♀️ #AlternativeGuide
https://t.co/AtzoUg2b2x https://t.co/WbUBNLu3aA
Are you an experienced #TravelAgent who is looking for their next challenge? Join our team! https://t.co/nuLr5g4Sft ✈️#jobs #wehire #lavoro #lavoraconnoi #AirDolomiti https://t.co/BgYLlyfv8W

The beginning of the 20th century marked the birth of #Futurism, celebrating flight as "the highest expression of freedom of #movement and #dynamism" and paying homage to speed and innovation in every field! #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/mgLSNoidK6 https://t.co/yinqzxckRR

One of the most incredible discoveries made by our #Socialite on her travels around #Verona is "The Gentleman of Verona", a boutique hotel just a few steps from the Arena. Read more at #AlternativeGuide 🎩
https://t.co/hy0IK2vTjx https://t.co/oqTngi1HC7

data.text: Thanks, @PITISPOTTERCLUB for this awesome photo! We really love it! 🤩✈️#avgeek #vrn #embraer #AirDolomiti https://t.co/8Y9OWsedLe

Discerning travellers don't give up on comfort and like to have some fun. If you class yourself as a member of this category, your ideal hub should look like @munichairport! 🛬🛫😎 #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/cdPfTHuCOK https://t.co/6ngsNNhV4D

#Verona is well known for being the "city of lovers" 💘. A short distance from Piazza delle Erbe lies the "Pozzo dell'Amore" (Well of Love), which is linked to a tragic end for Corrado and Isabella. #AlternativeGuide https://t.co/4HOcPuLMlh https://t.co/u8xS4cX8Pr

data.text: It is possible to stay looking #healthy and rested during a #flight! 💃 Here’s what you need to have in your hand luggage at all times. https://t.co/9O0i7VaCFM  #AirDolomitiBlog #beautycase #beautytips https://t.co/7DVi1YoW4r

If you're strolling through #Verona at sunset, our #Storyteller recommends the breathtaking view from 84 metres up the Lamberti Tower, which offers a superb panorama and can be visited all year round: https://t.co/41o5T8TSgo. 
#AirDolomiti #AlternativeGuide https://t.co/wAg5XKTJau
RT @zenatowinery: "Excellence is never a chance. It is a choice". Emanuela Colombo has portrayed all the precious hands and minds behind Ze…
RT @zenatowinery: Con @Air_Dolomiti per la mostra #Amarone #behindexcellence @CortonaOTM https://t.co/Aiq7DdvMCA

Discover the city of Romeo and Juliet by William Shakespeare, and the second home of the Supreme Poet, Dante! You'll find this and much more in our video devoted to the enigmatic and fascinating city of #Verona. 🎬 https://t.co/SN2BP66W6p #AlternativeGuide #AirDolomiti
Taking off into this new week ✈️ https://t.co/WOLEH5MQKd

The Intellectual, the Sporty Type, the Socialite, the Storyteller and the Traveller: it's our pleasure to introduce you to the characters and authors of the #AlternativeGuide 🎓🧢💄🕶️👒 #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/J5wkfEgV0v

Would you like to become a #FlightAttendant and get the CCA European Certification? We are pleased to invite you to our castings in #Verona, #Milan, #Meran and #Brixen in #September 2018. https://t.co/5DzkYckSl9 #wehire #joboffer #recruiting #job #joinus #AirDolomiti https://t.co/ldWgibFUjR

data.text: This month #AlternativeGuide features the beautiful and mysterious #Verona. Among the most evocative locations you'll find the “Scaliger tombs”, a monumental funerary complex in Gothic style of the ancient Lords of Verona. #AirDolomiti https://t.co/zSr6gwS5ua https://t.co/406G0Tvt9L
RT @tgtourism: I sapori emiliani protagonisti dei #voli #AirDolomiti https://t.co/DhZhkh41d7 https://t.co/BdAEFUkmbs

An essential stop-off in #Venice for anyone who loves reading is the Acqua Alta bookshop, where all the books are displayed displayed in boats, canoes, gondolas and bathtubs. A marvel not to be missed! https://t.co/wNfcfBHFph #AlternativeGuide #AirDolomiti
